description: Retrieves the analysis rule for a configured table association.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the membership that the configured table association belongs to. Currently accepts the membership ID.

parameters.name: configuredTableAssociationIdentifier
parameters.description: The identiï¬er for the conï¬gured table association that's related to the analysis rule.

parameters.name: analysisRuleType
parameters.description: The type of analysis rule that you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: analysisRule
nested_items.description: The analysis rule for the conï¬gured table association. In the console, the ConfiguredTableAssociationAnalysisRule is referred to as the collaboration analysis rule.

nested_items.name: membershipIdentifier
nested_items.description: The membership identifier for the configured table association analysis rule.

nested_items.name: configuredTableAssociationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the configured table association.

nested_items.name: configuredTableAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured table association.

nested_items.name: allowedResultReceivers
nested_items.description: The list of collaboration members who are allowed to receive results of queries run with this configured table.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: allowedAdditionalAnalyses
nested_items.description: The list of resources or wildcards (ARNs) that are allowed to perform additional analysis on query output.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: aggregation
nested_items.description: Analysis rule type that enables only aggregation queries on a configured table.

nested_items.description: The list of collaboration members who are allowed to receive results of queries run with this configured table.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the configured table association analysis rule.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the configured table association analysis rule.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The update time of the configured table association analysis rule.
